overview: A supermarket operator from Ahlbeck (Usedom) is found dead, naked, in the spa gardens of neighboring Swinem√ºnde in Poland. Inspector Julia Thiel and her Polish colleague Marek Wozniak are investigating together. Only initially does everything look like a sexual offense. The woman wanted to meet one of her cashiers to offer her a new apartment in Poland in exchange for an old, run-down house on the German side. However, it is said that the inspection of the apartment never took place. A case that particularly challenges Julia Thiel.
title: Schandfleck - Der Usedom-Krimi
